title: From Basic to Extra Features: Hypergraph Transformer Pretrain-then-Finetuning for Balanced Clinical Predictions on EHR
details: R Xu, Y Lu, C Liu, Y Chen, Y Sun, X Hu, JC Ho, C Yang - Proceedings of Machine …, 2024
abstract: Abstract Electronic Health Records (EHRs) contain rich patient information and are crucial for clinical research and practice. In recent years, deep learning models have been applied to EHRs, but they often rely on massive features, which may not be …
